item.title: Crypto stocks tumble as investors go into risk-off mode
item.description: Crypto stocks were among the hardest hit on Tuesday as investors dumped tech names.

item.title: Stick to Walmart, not Target, ahead of earnings this week, investment chief says
item.description: Victoria Greene, investment chief at G Squared Private Wealth, joined CNBC's "Power Check" Tuesday to share her thoughts on the big box retailers.

item.title: This 'picks-and-shovels' AI play is breaking out of resistance after seven years, the charts show

item.title: Top hedge funds piled into these S&P 500 stocks in second quarter, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: The Wall Street firm looked at the latest filings from the top 100 hedge funds to help investors assess how positioning shifted in the last quarter.
